input_text:
Job Title: Installation Crew Leader

Location: Mountain Brook, AL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Come join the team who has been leading the Birmingham industry with creativity and innovation for over 15 years. With your passion for the great outdoors and gifts of craftsmanship, you'll experience incredible satisfaction every day.

Your primary focus is the production and oversight of a variety of landscape construction work, while managing the schedule, customer experience, and crew dynamics.

Job responsibilities

Read landscape design|construction plans and lay out a project accordingly

Sequence the order of operations for each landscape project from its initial demolition to final polishing

Accurately assess the skills of the crew and delegate tasks accordingly

Construct various hardscape elements such as retaining walls, patios, and pathways

Install various softscape elements such as trees, shrubs, and turfgrass

If you want to collaborate with a team of trained horticulturalists, experienced managers, and dedicated professionals to service some of the most stunning outdoor rooms in our community…

If you seek a work environment that is fun, educational, empowering and driven by values such as integrity and passion…then read on…

Requirements

Minimum of 1 year of experience in management of landscape maintenance work or estimating OR a bachelor’s degree in Construction Management, Landscape Horticulture, Landscape Architecture, Civil Engineering or similar study OR associate’s degree in a related field.

Proficiency with landscape construction equipment (i.e., mini-ex, skid steer) and pulling trailers

Ability to access and navigate our bulk yard, loading areas, office space, and other areas of our facilities

Strength, stamina, and mobility to perform physical work outdoors, especially during hot and cold weather conditions

Strength, stamina, mobility, and ability to carry 80 pounds

Compensation

We provide amazing perks like robust health care, retirement benefits packages, incentivized goal achievement, paid vacation, and paid holidays. You will also receive continual training that allows you to advance your career while strengthening the Father Nature team. The salary range for this role depends on experience and education.

Communication Request

We use BambooHR as a portion of our hiring process. Emails we might send to you will come through BambooHR domains. To ensure you can receive these messages, please whitelist @bamboohr.com in your email provider.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Installation Crew Leader
output_json.summary: Join a leading Birmingham industry team with a passion for the great outdoors and craftsmanship.

Sequence the order of operations for each landscape project
Accurately assess crew skills and delegate tasks
